title: Chow
description:
This app is a personal project and is a work in progress. The idea was simple, build something that would help people decide on what to eat. Chow chooses a random eatery nearby the user's current location. 

An app that enables users to explore restaurants they wouldn't normally try, which in turn, generates traffic to more obscure local restaurants which, I hope, can help to enrich local communities.

title: Flux28
description:
FLUX28©️ Studio is a multidisciplinary company with a team of filmmakers and multimedia artists working together to create substantial image and voice for many known brands. 

They thrive on honouring creative pursuits and design aesthetics to fit client’s goals on having high quality production. I helped them design their website

title: ZB
description:
ZB LLC is an agency run by a small team of oursourced talent, on a project basis. The company mostly focuses on marketing and providing web design and development for clients. 

I worked with them on their company rebranding, revamping their website and worked with many of their clients as an outsourced designer.
